mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game(game_no, game_date,game_time,game_addr, game_flag, club_no, club_ability) VALUES ( #{game_no}, #{game_date}, #{game_time}, #{game_addr}, #{game_flag}, #{club_no}, #{club_ability});
INSERT INTO game(game_no, game_date,game_time,game_addr, game_flag, club_no, club_ability) VALUES ( #{game_no}, #{game_date}, #{game_time}, #{game_addr}, #{game_flag}, #{club_no}, #{club_ability});
mapper.select: select * from game inner join club on game.club_no=club.club_no where game_no not in (select game_no from game where game_flag ='AWAY' or game_flag ='INVITE') order by game_no desc;

select distinct * from game where game_no in (select game_no from challenge where (sender_club_no=#{club_no} or receiver_club_no=#{club_no}) and challenge_flag='YES') order by game_date desc, game_time desc, game_flag desc;
select * from game where game_no not in (select game_no from game where game_flag='AWAY' or game_flag='INVITE') and club_no=#{club_no};
select * from game where game_no=#{game_no} and game_flag='HOME';
select case when max(game_no) is null then 0 else max(game_no) end from game;
select club_name from club where club_no=#{club_no};
